instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1466 13" air ssd not reconized
threads.message:
i have two Macbook air boards that do not recognize the ssd.  what would cause this issue?  

Thanks

threads.title: A1466 13" air ssd not reconized
threads.message: The high sierra update? Boot from USB and check in Disk Utility if SSD hardware is recognized. Board needs BIOS update for APFS so install 10.11 and then update to latests OSX.

threads.title: A1466 13" air ssd not reconized
threads.message: they are not running high sierra,  but i will check in disk utility and perform the bios update and post back
